description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and layout of a React application. It includes CSS variables for light and dark themes and styles for various components like the app header, logo, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers text and applies background and text color based on theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo, includes size and animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application that displays the main content and aligns items center.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, applying color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the button to toggle between themes, includes positioning, background color, and hover effects.
